events.headline: CONSTRUCTION
events.description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), westbound. Construction work at Exit 73 (Langley - District). Until Wed Dec 31 at 7:00 PM PDT. Exit ramp is closed. Current westbound offramp loop is closed. A new offramp will open before the overpass. Exit the highway and turn left or right onto 264th Street. Next update time Wed Dec 31 at 7:00 AM PDT. Last updated Sat Aug 2 at 11:01 PM PDT. (DBC-76914)

events.headline: CONSTRUCTION
events.description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Ford Rd and Bolton Rd for 4.5 km (Tappen). Until Wed Dec 31. From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PDT on weekdays and Saturday. Speed limit 60 km/h. Single lane alternating traffic and intermittent stoppages. Expect delays up to 20 min delays. Watch for traffic control. Next update time Mon Dec 1 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Sat Sep 13 at 6:42 AM PDT. (DBC-72306)

Watch for traffic control. Next update time Monday, December 1 at 9:00 AM. Last updated Saturday, September 13 at 6:42 AM.

events.headline: INCIDENT
events.description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway). Rest area closed at Redgrave (14 km east of East Boundary of Glacier National Park). Redgrave rest area is permanently closed. New rest area will be built just west of the current location. Stay tuned for more updates as construction progresses. Next update time Mon Dec 1. Last updated Mon Jul 21 at 12:51 PM MDT. (DBC-73964)
